summary.title: Beatspeak
summary.overview: A short summary about Beatspeak, highlighting what visitors can learn or discover.

details.title: Beatspeak
details.overview: This project began in college as a wearable sensor and has evolved into a non-contact version using MIT research principles. It incorporates OpenCV in a multithreaded environment, blending digital signal processing with linear algebra.
details.additionalInfo: Recently, the use of supervised learning has improved system performance, making it more efficient in noise handling. Efforts are ongoing to prepare Beatspeak for open-sourcing.

summary.title: NMT

details.title: NMT
details.overview: Neural Machine Translation (NMT) leverages deep learning algorithms to translate text from one language to another with high accuracy.
details.additionalInfo: Recent improvements in NMT have led to significant advancements in translation quality and speed.

details.title: Autonomous-Object-Detection
details.overview: This project involves developing advanced algorithms for detecting and classifying objects in various environments.
details.additionalInfo: Future work includes enhancing detection accuracy and expanding the range of detectable objects.

details.title: Autonomous-Navigation
details.overview: This project focuses on developing systems for autonomous navigation in complex environments using sensor fusion and AI techniques.
details.additionalInfo: Current research aims to improve navigation accuracy and robustness in diverse conditions.

details.title: Autonomous-Drone
details.overview: Developing autonomous drone technology that can navigate and perform tasks without human intervention.
details.additionalInfo: Focus areas include obstacle avoidance, real-time path planning, and multi-drone coordination.

details.additionalInfo: The project aims to create reliable and safe autonomous driving systems for real-world applications.
